summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Charmed: The Complete Series [DVD]
Review Date: 2011/09/08
Store: Holly Marie Combs  (Actor),     Alyssa Milano  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Paramount Home Entertainment, Drama
Product Description: ['NOTE', ':The DVD has following featuresClosed Captions on all seasonsNo subtitles on Seasons 1-7English, French, Portuguese, and Spanish subtitles on Season 8', 'Charmed', '™ explores the relationship between three sisters, who after discovering that they possess magical powers, are reluctantly thrown into a world of supernatural evils. The Halliwell sisters must keep their identity as “the Charmed Ones” secret from the world, with only themselves to rely upon, as they protect the innocent and fight demons.']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Feature', 'Format': 'AC-3, Box set, Color, Dolby, Dubbed, DVD, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Contributor': 'Drew Fuller, Rebecca Balding, Rose McGowan, Ted King, Shannen Doherty, Julian McMahon, Kristopher Simmons, Alyssa Milano, Brian Krause, Dorian Gregory, Holly Marie Combs, Jason SimmonsDrew Fuller, Rebecca Balding, Rose McGowan, Ted King, Shannen Doherty, Julian McMahon, Kristopher Simmons, Alyssa Milano, Brian Krause, Dorian Gregory, Holly Marie Combs, Jason Simmons  See more', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '2.43 x 7.74 x 11.13 inches; 4.71 Pounds', 'Item model number': '109898990', 'Media Format': 'AC-3, Box set, Color, Dolby, Dubbed, DVD, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Run time': '129 hours and 24 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 18, 2008', 'Actors': 'Holly Marie Combs, Alyssa Milano, Brian Krause, Rose McGowan, Dorian Gregory', 'Dubbed': 'French', 'Subtitles': 'English, Portuguese, Spanish, French', 'Studio': 'PARAMOUNT', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: I love this series, from beginning to end. i love the "book of shadows" packaging.  But i get to the last 10 minutes, of the last episode, of the series...and it pixilates and is not viewable anymore. neither is the bonus disc. every other disc played fine, so its not my player, so i must assume its the rather minor looking scratches, or the manufacturing.  total bummer. now i have to go through the whole returns process, mail it back, and am wondering if its worth it.  [[ASIN:B001BN4WL8 Charmed: The Complete Series]]
Review Title: series finale bummer
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Criminal Minds: Season 6 [DVD]
Review Date: 2011/10/06
Store: Joe Mantegna  (Actor),     Thomas Gibson  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Paramount Home Entertainment, Drama
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Criminal Minds', "revolves around an elite team of FBI profilers who analyze the country's most twisted criminal minds, anticipating their next moves before they strike again. The Behavioral Analysis Unit's most prominent agent is David Rossi (Joe Mantegna), a founding member of the BAU, who returns to help the team solve new cases, while pursuing some unfinished business of his own. Each member brings his or her own area of expertise to the table as they pinpoint predators' motivations and identify their emotional triggers in the attempt to stop them.", 'Amazon.com', 'If watching a season of', 'Criminal Minds', "simply makes you just want to watch more, that is a sign of success. Season six is a strong one that focuses on the BAU team's secrets. Emily Prentiss (Paget Brewster) has a story arc that is the highlight and gives you some of her international-spy back story, as well as a new secret for J.J. (A.J. Cook) and Aaron Hotchner (Thomas Gibson) to share. Episodes that focus on Dr. Spencer Reid (Matthew Gray Gubler) are always the bright spot of", 'Criminal Minds', ', and it\'s hard not to wish that his secret weren\'t explored more in depth, but perhaps the creators are leaving that arc for season seven. We also get the introduction of a new character, Ashley Seaver (Rachel Nichols), whose father just happens to be a serial killer. David Rossi (Joe Mantegna) is a bit in the background for season six, but maybe it\'s because he\'s been at the center of previous seasons. Shemar Moore\'s Derek Morgan is always nice to look at, but remains the least interesting character in the cast--even his "secret" isn\'t very compelling--though it is always good to see him interacting with Penelope Garcia (Kirsten Vangsness), who has an appropriately lighthearted secret of her own. Overall, this is a strong season--and even if you\'re not a longtime fan, it\'s an easy show to just jump into. Extras include deleted scenes and some fun behind-the-scenes looks at the Paget Brewster arc, the season as a whole, and how various crime scenes are created. You may think your next-door neighbor is a serial killer after watching a whole season, but that\'s just a delightful side effect of', 'Criminal Minds', '. --', 'Paige Newman']
Average Rating: 4.9
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Television, Television/Crime', 'Format': 'Color, Dolby, DVD, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Joe Mantegna, Thomas Gibson', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '6', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.9 x 5.4 x 7.7 inches; 5.78 Ounces', 'Audio Description': 'English', 'Item model number': 'PARD820774D', 'Media Format': 'Color, Dolby, DVD, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '17 hours and 2 minutes', 'Release date': 'January 13, 2015', 'Actors': 'Joe Mantegna, Thomas Gibson', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Paramount', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '6'}
Review Text: as far as the show itself goes, these are my people and i have every season thus far.  i love them all, and am superbly happy with the product, came new,  no scratches, good job.  what i didnt like, is that they were messing with the casting so much:  this one is gone, this one staying, oh wait that one may come back, but that one hasnt signed their contract yet.  i am going to be honest, i do not blame the actors in any way for the drama outside of actually shooting.  i blame the millionaires  who are the producers or execs, or whatever name they use for the credits roll.  granted, the show wouldn't be on the air but for them, but if they[[ASIN:B003R0MEZ4 Criminal Minds: The Sixth Season]] want to make bigger profits, they should try to make the fans happy.  having a little controversy is healthy, i will admit, but what went on this year, and leading to the new season, silly.
Review Title: i loved it!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation - Season 11
Review Date: 2011/10/06
Store: Laurence Fishburne  (Actor),     Marg Helgenberger  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Drama
Product Description: ['CSI: Crime Scene Investigation', 'is a fast-paced drama about a passionate team of forensic investigators trained to solve crimes the old-fashioned way – by examining the evidence.', 'CSI: Crime Scene Investigation', 'is on the case 24-7, scouring the scene, collecting irrefutable evidence and finding the missing pieces that will solve the mystery.']
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Television, Television/Crime', 'Format': 'Box set, Color, Widescreen, NTSC, Closed-captioned', 'Contributor': 'Marg Helgenberger, Laurence Fishburne', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '6', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 5.4 x 7.7 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': '64290880980', 'Media Format': 'Box set, Color, Widescreen, NTSC, Closed-captioned', 'Run time': '16 hours and 2 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 27, 2011', 'Actors': 'Laurence Fishburne, Marg Helgenberger', 'Studio': 'Paramount', 'Number of discs': '6'}
Review Text: i have been waiting impatiently for this one.  it seems i missed so many episodes of this season and was so confused.  i watched every episode over the weekend and have absolutely no guilt.  i am going to be missing Dr. Ray, but maybe he might pop in from time to time, who knows.  anyway, i have every season since the first and i still like the show.  i will always be a grissom fan, but that doesnt take away from the awesome work they are doing now.  highly recommend!
Review Title: could not wait for this one to hit my stoop!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Review Date: 2019/06/22
Average Rating: 4.8

Review Text: I loved this!  creative characters, story line, effects, all of it is just fabulous!  I know this might upset some religious types (petitions are already being signed to take it off the air, LOL) but it shouldn't as this is a work of FICTION!  Aziraphale and Crowley are wonderful characters, an angel and a demon (former angel), but the best of friends through Heaven and Hell.  I just loved it, and am going to watch it again.  I have been telling all of my family and friends to watch it.  All of the actors are spot on, and the rest of the people who brought this series to life are so talented.  How about season 2?
Review Title: Armaggeden was never so much fun!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Review Text: i have been waiting impatiently for this one.  it seems i missed so many episodes of this season and was so confused.  i watched every episode over the weekend and have absolutely no guilt.  i am going to be missing Dr. Ray, but maybe he might pop in from time to time, who knows.  anyway, i have every season since the first and i still like the show.  i will always be a grissom fan, but that doesnt take away from the awesome work they are doing now.  highly recommend!

Review Text: I loved this!  creative characters, story line, effects, all of it is just fabulous!  I know this might upset some religious types (petitions are already being signed to take it off the air, LOL) but it shouldn't as this is a work of FICTION!  Aziraphale and Crowley are wonderful characters, an angel and a demon (former angel), but the best of friends through Heaven and Hell.  I just loved it, and am going to watch it again.  I have been telling all of my family and friends to watch it.  All of the actors are spot on, and the rest of the people who brought this series to life are so talented.  How about season 2?
Review Title: Armaggeden was never so much fun!

SUMMARY:
The analysis of the purchase history reveals a strong preference for engaging and quality drama series, particularly those featuring crime, supernatural elements, and character-driven narratives. The consistent high ratings (mostly between 4.7 and 5.0) indicate a general satisfaction with the shows viewed, suggesting a preference for compelling storytelling and well-developed characters. 

Common themes include a fascination with crime investigation genres, as seen in purchases related to popular series that revolve around criminal profiling and forensic science. This user appears to enjoy suspenseful narratives that involve complex character relationships.

Quality preferences align with DVDs that are formatted with additional features like closed captions, multiple languages, and bonus content, highlighting a desire for comprehensive viewing experiences. Their comfort with a variety of language options further indicates openness to diverse content.

Price sensitivity is not explicitly stated, yet the consistent choice of complete series and season collections hints at a willingness to invest in full narratives over single episodes or lower-quality releases. Overall, this individual's core preferences center around immersive, high-quality drama series with rich narratives and character dynamics, along with an appreciation for robust viewing features.

target_interaction.title: Bottom line
target_interaction.text: There's been a lot of comments, lots of opinions, so I will keep it simple...I love it!  5 stars.
